title: Blue Sunshine [1976 PAL DVD][En Subs[Nordic]
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0074226/5,9" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0074226/5,9</a>


At a party, someone goes insane and murders three women. Falsely accused of te brutal killings, Jerry is on the run. More bizarre killings continue with alarming frequency all over town. Trying to clear his name, Jerry discovers the shocking truth... people are losing their hair and turning into violent psychopaths and the connection may be some LSD all the murderers took a decade before. Soon, if Jerry can't stop it, the horror will become uncontrollable... the horror caused by Blue Sunshine!



Director Jeff Lieberman
Certificate Restricted
Year 1976
Screen Widescreen 16:9 Anamorphic
Languages English - Dolby Digital (5.1)
Subtitles Nordic 
Duration 90 minutes (approx)

Actors

Alice Ghostley, Ann Cooper, Charles Siebert, Deborah Winters, Mark Goddard, Ray Young, Robert Walden, Stefan Gierasch & Zalman King
